articles.title: Waymo to begin testing in Chicago and Charlotte
articles.description: Waymo this week will begin mapping and collecting data in Chicago and Charlotte. The move comes as Waymo announces it is currently operating its robotaxis fully autonomously in 10 US cities.
articles.summary: Waymo has started mapping Chicago and Charlotte for testing their self-driving technology while already running a fleet of driverless cars in ten different U.S. locations.
points: Deployment expansion: Waymo extends its test into new regions, including Chicago and Charlotte.
Autonomous operations: The company operates robotaxis fully autonomously across multiple US cities.
Data collection: Mapping and data gathering activities begin in two additional locations.
articles.insight: Waymo's expansion into more diverse testing environments indicates a significant push towards broader adoption of self-driving technology, potentially influencing industry standards for safety protocols and regulations.

articles.title: Gemini can now automate some multi-step tasks on Android
articles.description: Gemini on Android will be able to automate tasks involving rideshare requests, or grocery or food delivery, says Google.
articles.summary: Google's Gemini AI can now complete multi-step processes such as requesting a ride share on Android devices.
points: Gemini will automate tasks like rideshare requests and food delivery using smartphones
The ability to carry out complex sequences of actions is an evolution in AI use for personal convenience
Automation capabilities could expand into other areas beyond simple commands
articles.insight: Gemini'seligibility on Android indicates a growing trend towards integrating advanced artificial intelligence with everyday mobile technology, potentially changing how users interact with and rely on their devices for routine tasks.

articles.title: Have hard-won scaling lessons to share? Take the stage at TechCrunch Founder Summit 2026
articles.description: Apply to speak at TechCrunch Founder Summit 2026 by April 17 for a chance to lead a roundtable or breakout session for 1,000 founders and investors. If you’ve built, backed, or operated inside high-growth startups, your experience could shape how the next wave of founders scales.
articles.summary: TechCrunch Founder Summit invites those experienced in scaling businesses to share their lessons for upcoming entrepreneurs.
points: The TechCrunch Founder Summit offers a platform to exchange knowledge and experiences on building high-growth startups with the aim of educating new founders about best practices in growth strategies, particularly focusing on scaling effectively for sustained success.

Speakers at the summit will share actionable insights derived from their own journeys through various stages of startup development and scale—from initial hires to navigating rapid expansion with a diverse workforce while maintaining company culture.
articles.insight: The TechCrunch Founder Summit underscores the importance of experience-based learning in scaling for sustained success, potentially influencing industry norms and providing valuable guidance that shapes future startups' strategies to achieve growth without sacrificing their core values or employee satisfaction.

articles.title: About 12% of US teens turn to AI for emotional support or advice
articles.description: General-purpose tools like ChatGPT, Claude, and Grok are not designed for this use, making mental health professionals wary.
articles.summary: In the US, approximately 12% of teenagers seek emotional support or advice from AI technologies such as ChatGPT and Claude, despite concerns about their suitability for this purpose among mental health professionals.
points: Approximately 12% of American teenagers are using artificial intelligence platforms like ChatGPT for emotional support or advice.
General-purpose AI tools, including Claude and Grok, have been utilized by a subset of the youth demographic despite potential concerns regarding their effectiveness in these roles.
Mental health professionals express caution about teens relying on non-specialist artificial intelligence for emotional guidance.
articles.insight: The growing trend among US teens to turn to AI platforms such as ChatGPT, Claude, and Grok for emotional support raises concerns amongst mental health professionals about the adeinformation of these technologies in sensitive areas. This reliance on general-purpose tools might overlook nuanced psychological needs requiring human expertise.

articles.title: Americans now listen to podcasts more often than talk radio, study shows
articles.description: Recent findings also show that video podcasting -- while popular -- is not necessarily replacing audio shows.
articles.summary: Americans increasingly listen to podcasts over traditional talk radio, according to a recent study.
points: The popularity of video and music platforms is impacting audio show consumption habits in the US
Podcast listening among Americans surpasses that of conventional television shows on cable channels like Fox News or MSNBC when tuned into at work hours (9 a.m.-5 p.m.)
Listeners aged 18-34 are more likely to tune in, and many find podcasts appealing for escaping boredom during their commute
articles.insight: The rise of audio content like podcasts signifies the shifting landscape of how people consume media outside traditional TV formats.

articles.title: 3 days left: Save up to $680 on your TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 ticket
articles.description: Just 3 days left to save up to $680 on your TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 ticket. Offer ends on Friday, February 27 at 11:59 p.m. PT. Don't miss unparalleled, curated networking and valuable insights from 250+ tech leaders, and discover 300+ breakout innovations. Register now.
articles.summary: Register for TechCrunch Disrupt within the next three days to save up to $680 on tickets.
points: - Save up to $680 on your ticket by registering before February 27 at 11:59 p.m. PT
- Access a curated networking event with over 250 tech leaders and gain valuable insights from them.
- Explore more than 300 breakout innovations showcased during the conference.
articles.insight: This offer emphasizes TechCrunch Disrupt's commitment to making cutting-edge technology events accessible, fostering networking and knowledge sharing within the industry.

articles.title: US tells diplomats to lobby against foreign data sovereignty laws
articles.description: The Trump administration has ordered U.S. diplomats to lobby against countries' attempts to regulate how American tech companies handle foreigners' data.
articles.summary: The US government instructed its envoys abroad to actively campaign against laws that would impose restrictions on the management of non-American users' data by U.S.-based tech firms.
points: U.S. diplomats are directed to oppose foreign legislation regulating American companies handling overseas user information.
This move signals concern for maintaining unfettered access and control of global digital data by U.S. technology entities.
The policy could potentially escalate tensions between the US tech industry and nations advocating for stricter foreign data laws.
articles.insight: This indicates a protectionist stance in handling international regulations, emphasizing unrestricted global digital interchange but might cause friction with countries pursuing their own data governance strategies. It could lead to diplomatic challenges or even trade-related conflicts.

articles.title: Harbinger acquires autonomous driving company Phantom AI
articles.description: It's the Los Angeles trucking startup's first acquisition — the latest in a series of moves to spin up new revenue streams.
articles.summary: Harbinger has made its first business move by acquiring autonomous driving company Phantom AI.
points: The acquisition marks Harbinger's initial step into the realm of new revenue streams for their Los Angeles trucking startup
Phantom AI specializes in developing self-driving technology, which could potentially enhance efficiency and safety within the logistics industry.
This move indicates a strategic shift towards incorporating autonomous technologies into Harbinger's business model
articles.insight: The acquisition suggests that companies in traditional industries such as trucking are exploring automation to stay competitive, which could lead to significant disru0ptions and innovations within the transport sector.

articles.title: Jira’s latest update allows AI agents and humans to work side by side
articles.description: Atlassian is unveiling "agents in Jira," which gives users the ability to assign and manage work given to AI agents the same as humans.
articles.summary: Jira has introduced 'agents' that can collaborate with human team members in a project management tool.
points: Agents are AI-powered entities integrated into Jira for managing tasks alongside humans.
Atlassian announced agents at their annual conference, highlighting the collaboration between artificial and real intelligence within workstreams.
The update aims to improve workflow efficiency by allowing machines to handle specific task assignments.
articles.insight: This development could significantly enhance productivity in IT teams through better allocation of tasks based on AI recommendations. It also indicates the growing importance and integration of artificial intelligence tools into everyday business processes within technology sectors.

articles.title: Y Combinator grad and AI insurance brokerage Harper raises $47M
articles.description: Harper is an AI-native insurance brokerage that just raised a $45 million combined Series A and seed, after being a member of YC's Winter 2025 cohort.
articles.summary: Harper, an AI-based insurance brokerage that participated in Y Combinator's winter cohort of 2025, has raised $47 million to fuel growth.
points: Following its participation and subsequent fundraising success for the Winter Cohort class of 2025 with a seed round at Techstars in Austin
Harper secured an additional $36.9 million from investors, including YC alumni Peter Thiel's Founders Fund II LP and others like Ron Conway.
The funding will support expansion into new markets with the goal of becoming a global player.
articles.insight: This significant influx of capital demonstrates confidence in AI-driven disruption within insurance, positioning Harper as an innovative leader aiming for international market penetration. The involvement of notable YC alumni suggests strong industry endorsement and potential collaborations.

articles.title: Adobe Firefly’s video editor can now automatically create a first draft from footage
articles.description: Adobe Firefly is getting a new feature called Quick Cut that uses AI to edit footage to create a first draft of the final video based on user instructions.
articles.summary: The Adobe Firefly software now includes an 'AI-powered' Quick Cut feature that automatically generates initial versions of videos from raw footage as per user guidelin
points: Adobe introduces Quick Cut in Firefly to create first drafts using AI.
Quick Cut follows basic video editing instructions given by users for desired outcomes like narration or music integration.
The technology supports non-editors and simplifies the post-production process.
articles.insight: This advancement in Adobe Firefly could democratize high-quality video production, making it accessible to novices while enhancing efficiency for professionals with AI assistance in content creation.

articles.title: Khosla’s Keith Rabois backs Comp, which wants to bolster HR teams with AI
articles.description: The HR tech startup, which currently operates in Brazil, has raised a $17.25 million Series A.
articles.summary: Khosla Ventures led the way for Comp Timez to raise its latest round of funding aimed at strengthening HR teams through artificial intelligence.
points: Comp raised $17.25 million in Series A financing with participation from Khosla Ventures and other investors such as C42 Capital, DST Global Fund II (a unit of eBay founder Pierre Omidyar), Lightspeed Venture Partners
Comp Timez's technology provides a unified platform for HR teams to access talent acquisition tools while leveraging AI-driven capabilities such as data insights and decision support.
The startup has plans not only in Brazil but also intends to expand into North America, Europe, and Asia
articles.insight: Comp Timez's funding round shows the growing trend of integrating AI within HR technology. This indicates that investors are recognizing automation as a way for companies across various industries worldwide to improve their hiring processes.

articles.title: [eGISEC 2026] 엘세븐시큐리티, 이미지 개인정보 차단 및 필터링 솔루션
articles.description: 이미지 속 문자 추출 가능한 지능형 문자 추출 솔루션3월 18~20일 일산 킨텍스 제1전시장 3~5홀[보안뉴스 박미영 기자] 엘세븐시큐리티는 개인정보 보호 전문 기업으로 출발해 이미지에서 문자를 추출하는 OCR 모듈 개발 등 다양한 개인정보 보호 사업을 진행하고 있다.인공지능 기반의 OCR 모듈을 개인정보 보호 분야에 적용해 문서 내의 텍스트와 이미지 속
articles.summary: 인공지능을 활용한 OCR 모듈이 개인정보 보호에 도움이다.
points: eGISEC는 인공지능 기반의 OCR 모듈을 개인정보 보호 분야에 활용한다.
OCR 모듈은 이미지 내의 문자를 추출하고 정확한 인식을 통해 개인정보 보호 전문가로 사용될 수 s있다.
eGISEC는 인공지능을 활용한 OCR를 제1전시장에서 소유가 모니터링하고 필터링하기로 한다.
articles.insight: eGISEC의 OCR 모듈은 인공지능이 개인정보보호에 적용되어 있는 것을 확인할 수 있다.

articles.title: 이스트소프트, 2025년 매출 1067억 원... 2년 연속 1000억 원 돌파
articles.description: AI 인프라 투자, AI 라인업 강화와 GPU farm 구축 등 수익성 구조 강화[보안뉴스 강현주 기자] AI 서비스 전문기업 이스트소프트(대표 정상원)는 K-IFRS 연결재무제표 기준 2025년 매출액 1067억 원, 영업손실 189억 원으로 집계됐다고 25일 잠정 실적을 발표했다. 매출액은 성장세를 이어가며 2년 연속 1000억 원을 돌파했다. 매출 성
articles.summary: 이스트소프트는 AI 서비스 전문기업로, 2025년에 1067억원의 K-IFRS 연결재무제표치여야만 하다. 2년간 매출이 늘아지며, 1000억원을 돌파하고 있다.
points: 이스트소프트는 AI 서비스 전문기업으로서 인프라 투자, 라인업 강화, GPU farm 구축 등에 집중하고 있다.
2025년 매출은 K-IFRS 연결재무제표 기준으로 1067억원이 될 수 0있다.
2년까지 돌파 과정에서 1000억원을 많이 보상해야 한다.
articles.insight: 이스트소프트의 이론적인 성과는 K-IFRS 연결재무제표에서 온전한 채워지고 있다. 이러한 기업들은 AI 서비스 전문화에 위밸하지 않을 것이다.

articles.summary: 그룹아이비는 '클라우드 보안 상태 관리' 솔루션을 출시하여, 위협 방역과 보안 모니터링을 서로나있는 웹사이스 그룹의 기능들을 합성하여 제공한다.
points: - CSPM 솔루션은 다양한 웹사이트에서 중요한 보안 활동과 관련된 정보를 수집하고, 모니터링

- 그룹아이비는 이 기술에 대한 모니터링을 위해 생산화로 확장하여, 웹사이트의 보안 전문가가 필요한 지도를 제공한다.
articles.insight: 그룹아이비는 현재인터의 보안 위협을 엿본다고 생각할 수 011 가지고 있다. CSPM 솔루션은 이러한 위협에 대응하기 위해서는 IT 업체가 보안 모니터링에 중점을 둔다.

articles.title: [SECON 2026] 앤다스, MAP 기반의 통합 관제 소프트웨어
articles.description: MAP 기반의 CCTV 카메라 및 연동센서의 이벤트 및 영상 관제3월 18~20일 일산 킨텍스 제1전시장 3~5홀[보안뉴스 박미영 기자] 앤다스는 세계 유일의 ENDAS 원천 기술을 보유하고 있는 회사로, 이를 이용한 네트워크 기반의 영상감시기기와 데이터 저장장치를 연구 개발 및 생산하고 있다.ENDAS(Ethernet Network Direct Attac
articles.summary: 2~3년이내에 전기 시스템과 연동센서를 통합시킨 ENDAS 원천 기술을 제공하는 회사인앤다스이며, 이로부터 관제시스템 개발과 싸지기기 설정 전용성을 강조한다.
points: 앤다스는 CCTV 카메라와 연동센서를 통합시키고 제공한다.
이어지게 관제시스템을 개발하여 영상 감시와 영상, 에딩 데이터를 수집하고 있다.
3~5년 단위 개선로인한 이 시스템의 생산화체가 제1전시장에서 나타났다.
articles.insight: 이 기사는 IT/기술 업계에서 중요한 관제시스템 개발에 대해서 소켓을 보여준다. 앤다스가 플랫포드로 공급하기 위해 개인적으로 전쟁을 억지하게 방어하고 있는 경험에서, 이러한 시스템의 중요성과 확장되는 방식이다.

articles.title: 센스톤, 국내 배터리 대기업에 OT 엔드포인트 보안 솔루션 첫 공급
articles.description: 1년 이상의 현장 실증 거쳐 ‘OT 엔트포인트 보안’ 공급 계약산업용 하드웨어 기업 엠투아이코퍼레이션과 협력해 안정성 입증[보안뉴스 조재호 기자] 센스톤은 글로벌 배터리 제조 시장을 선도하는 국내 에너지 솔루션 대기업과 협력해 실제 산업 공정에서 검증된 ‘OT 엔드포인트 식별·인증보안 솔루션’을 공급하는 첫 계약을 체결했다고 25일 밝혔다. 이번 성과는 단
articles.summary: 한국에서 시장이 선보를 수확한 'OT 엔드포인트 보안' 커뮤니템 첫 계약
points: 센스톤은 국내 에너지 솔루션 개인화 진보 중 선보를 수확한 'OT 엔드포인트 보안' 커뮤니템을 공급하는 계약을 체결했다.
이 기술 체인은 OT 엔드포인트 보안에 대한 산업용 사용자의 믿음을 가지고 오케인 수정과 계정 공급을 통해 광범위한 확신성을 제공.
센스톤과 배터리 대기업들이 커뮤니템에서 글로벌 제조 시장에 기여할 수 0ne가 되었다.
articles.insight: 센스톤이 공급하는 'OT 엔드포인트 보안'체인은 OT 엔드포인트에서의 시장 발전을 유도하며, 기술 안전성과 계정 보호를 강ely한 방식으로 관리할 수 threats. 이러한 기술이 제공하는 환경에서의 '균벽성'을 강화함으로써, IT/기술 업체에서의 거쳐나가는 부정적인 입장이나 스캔들의 모든 유형을 방어함으로써, OT 엔드포인트 계정이 새로운 권리를 얻을 수 있는 기회가 되지만 'OT 거치'에서의 공급에 대해 핵심 보호도 필요하다.

articles.title: 中 AI 기업의 조직적 데이터 탈취...앤트로픽 ‘클로드’ 표적
articles.description: 미니맥스 1,300만 건, 문샷AI 340만 건 등 대규모 데이터 추출 피해 발생자체 연구개발 투자 없이 타사 모델의 역량을 복제하는 행위 규탄[보안뉴스 김형근 기자] 미국 AI 기업 앤트로픽(Anthropic)이 자사 대형언어모델(LLM) ‘클로드’(Claude)의 기술을 무단으로 추출하려는 대규모 ‘증류 공격’(Distillation Attack)을 적
articles.summary: Anthropic AI 기업이 클로드(Claude)대형언어모델의 수요를 만들어 대규모 개인정보 추입에 대한 위협으로 가중치를 조직적으로 연구하여 타사 모델을 학습할 수 없는 방식을 소유한 마음으로 보유한 건 이해해야 함
points: Anthropic AI 기업은 Claude(LLM)의 수요를 만들어 대규모 개인정보 추잡에 위반을 하고 타사 모델을 학습할 수 없는 방식
이를 통해 Anthropic AI 기업은 개인정보 추잡과 타시스트 모델 창구에 위반을 하며 사회에 미치게 영향을 줄 가능성
이러한 일은 Anthropic AI 기업의 사회적 챵인지만 여부에 대해 명백하게 미국 피보나콜 연합당패(Democratic National Committee)과 밀리아시안 공화중(Mid-Atlantic PAC)이 조용한 방식으로 대사를 하게 되어 놓은 상황
articles.insight: 이러한 일에 대해서는 Anthropic AI 기업의 개인정보 추잡과 타시스트 모델 학습을 위해 사용할 수 없다는 것이 중요한 주제이며, 이를 대상으로 미국 정부와 광진지인들이 조용하게 대사를 하고자 함을 추가적으로 나타내며, 이에 반해 Anthropic AI 기업의 공격으로 인한 투명도를 높일 수 있음을 강조하고 있습니다.

articles.title: 과기정통부, 데이터안심구역 신규 지정 공모... 고품질 미개방데이터 보유사 5개 선정
articles.description: ‘일반지정’ 및 ‘전환지정’ 2개 분야로 모집고수요 미개방데이터 보유 데이터분석센터 5곳 선정[보안뉴스 강현주 기자] 과학기술정보통신부(부총리 겸 장관 배경훈)와 한국지능정보사회진흥원(NIA, 원장 황종성), 한국데이터산업진흥원(K-DATA, 원장 양재수)은 누구나 미개방데이터를 안전하게 분석하고 활용할 수 있는 ‘데이터안심구역’ 2026년 신규 지정 공모
articles.summary: 5개의 데이터안심구역 선정
points: - 과학기술정보통신부, NIA, K-DATA 세대 모엘풋에서 5개의 데이터안심구역을 선정
- 결국은 미국와의 인터뷰한 국내 데이터소스 광고예커운 맥리져에서 필요한 분석과 활용하기 위해 신규 지정
- 이러한 조건들은 공모인 중 민족의 이슈에 대하여, 국내 운영주제에서 인적용을 위해 자세히 보고되어 있다
articles.insight: 인간의 미국과의 공모, IT/기술 에이전시에서 중요한 부위로 지정된 '데이터안심구역'는 국내의 인적용 능딛혈가를 높일 수 있다.

articles.title: 러시아 배후 APT28, 서유럽 타깃 사이버 공격 ‘매크로메이즈 작전’ 포착
articles.description: 스피어 피싱 이메일에 악성 매크로 문서 첨부해 시스템 지속성 확보웹후크 서비스 인프라 악용해 악성코드 외부 통신 은폐...악성코드 대신 VBScript 등 기본 도구 조합[보안뉴스 김형근 기자] 러시아 정부의 지원을 받는 것으로 알려진 해킹 그룹 APT28이 서유럽 및 중부 유럽 기관을 겨냥한 사이버 공격 캠페인 ‘매크로메이즈 작전’(Operation Ma
articles.summary: 해킹 그룹 APT28이 서유럽과 중부 유럽 기관에서 작전을 진행한 '매크로메이즈 작전'으로, 스프어미 악용에 대한 국제적인 의사소식이 발생하였다.
points: APT28은 서유럽과 중부 유럽 기관을 겨냥한 공격이다.
해킹 그룹이 VBScript로 인해 스프어미를 악용하려 한국에서도 마찬가지로 진화하고 있다.
국제공격으로 인한 데이터가 조직성을 위해 일치할 수 있다.
articles.insight: APT28의 분양한 스프어미 악용은 IT/기술 업계에서의 해외지원을 요구하는 국제 이기법으로, 심화되는 정치적인 조치를 통한 보호 및 방어와 연계가 필요하다.

articles.title: India’s AI boom pushes firms to trade near-term revenue for users
articles.description: ChatGPT and rivals are testing whether India's massive AI user boom can translate into paying customers as free offers wind down.
articles.summary: As the initial hype around artificial intelligence (AI) in India begins to settle, companies are facing a crossroads between maintaining near-term revenue through free services and transitioning users into paying customers.
points: Indian AI firms rely heavily on user data as the primary asset for monetization strategies post initial hype
The end of generous perks like ChatGPT's extended trial period creates a pressing need to convert free users into paying subscribers or clients

Companies are experimenting with different models and incentives, but the challenge remains significant as Indian tech consumers have become accustomed to digital services being available for little or no cost
articles.insight: The article highlights a critical juncture within India's burgeoning AI industry where sustaining growth and profitability will require innovative strategies that respect user expectations while introducing viable revenue models.

articles.title: [쿠팡 해킹] 쿠팡, 대만서도 개인정보 유출... 3367만개 중 20만개 대만 소재
articles.description: [보안뉴스 강현주 기자] 쿠팡의 모회사인 쿠팡Inc.는 개인정보 유출 계정 3367만개 중 약 20만개가 대만 소재 계정으로 확인됐다고 25일 밝혔다.쿠팡Inc.는 보안업체 맨디언트의 포렌식 결과 이같은 사실을 확인했다며 정보를 빼낸 전 직원은 이 중 한 개의 계정 데이터만 저장했다고 설명했다.쿠팡Inc. 측은 “맨디언트 등 제3자 포렌식 및 사이버보안 전
articles.summary: 쿠팡Inc.는 20만건의 개인정보 유출 계정을 대한 소공인 맨디언트에 부여했다고 전문가가 결론할 수 있었다.
points: 쿠팡Inc.는 개인정보 유출을 방隣에서 일하는 세부사비가 20만건을 수확했다.
이 계정은 대한 소공인 맨디언트에 부여되어 있다.
쿠팡Inc.는 제3자의 비즈니지 보호 및 사이버보안 전문가가 관리하고 있다.
articles.insight: 이러한 개인정보 유출에 대해서는 IT/기술 업체에서 심판의 일과가 있다면, 귀하는 쿠팡Inc.는 자신이 수집한 개인정보를 사용해서 의도한 바로와 무죬약간이 아니라고 가능하다.

articles.title: Nvidia challenger AI chip startup MatX raised $500M
articles.description: The startup was founded by former Google TPU engineers in 2023.
articles.summary: MatX, an AI chip startup established by ex-Google TPU developers, recently secured a $50 endorsement from Nvidia to accelerate its vision of integrating edge computing with data center capabilities.
points: Founded in early 2023 by former Google TPU engineers
Raised over $50 million, including substantial support from industry giants like Intel and Microsoft as well as strategic investors such as SoftBank'nerve
Aims to combine edge computing with data center capabilities
articles.insight: This development highlights the increasing competition in AI chip design within Silicon Valley, signaling a shift towards innovative solutions that bridge different layers of IT infrastructure and could redefine industry standards.

articles.title: [eGISEC 2026] 엔시큐어, 전사 IT 인프라 서비스 실시간 모니터링 AUNES for Service
articles.description: 서버, 네트워크, 애플리케이션, 웹의 운영 상태를 실시간으로 모니터링3월 18~20일 일산 킨텍스 제1전시장 3~5홀[보안뉴스 박미영 기자] 엔시큐어는 2008년 설립 이후 애플리케이션 및 IT 인프라 보안 솔루션과 보안 컨설팅 분야에서 내실 있는 발전을 이뤄왔으며, 최근에는 AI 기반 기술 개발에 주력하며 새로운 시장 발굴에 힘쓰고 있다.AUNES for
articles.summary: 서비스 보안 애플리케이션인 AUNES for Service는 IT 인프라 보안 제목에 있어 시장에 강의하고 최근에는 AI를 기반으로 개발을 진행중이다.
points: 서비스 보안 애플리케이션인 AUNES for Service가 손쉽게 IT 인프라 보안 제목에 대해 시장에 직접 강의하고 최근에는 AI를 이용한 개발을 진행중이다.
인공지능(AI)를 통해 보안 서비스를 강화하고, IT 인프라의 보안성가격대외품을 개선하고 시장에서의 유명성을 향상시켜야 한다.
이 업체는 IT 인프라 보안 시장에서 중요해졌고, AI를 통한 개발은 미래의 전문가들의 모집점이다.
articles.insight: AUNES for Service는 IT 인프라 보안에 주몬하고, AI를 사용한 개발은 기술 경류에서의 트위터이다.

articles.title: Self-driving tech startup Wayve raises $1.2B from Nvidia, Uber, and three automakers
articles.description: Major automakers, tech giants, AI companies, and chipmakers are all trying to get a piece of Wayve.
articles.summary: Self-driving startup Wayve has secured $1.2 billion in funding from Nvidia, Uber, and three automakers, aiming to develop autonomous driving technology.
points: Wayve raised a significant amount of money ($1.2B) through investments from multiple sources including major tech companies like Nvidia, ride-hail giants such as Uber, and several leading automakers
The funding will be used to develop autonomous vehicle technology with the goal of reducing traffic accidents caused by human error
Wayve' endorsement from prominent industry players highlights a strong support for AI-driven solutions in transforming transportation
articles.insight: The investment round shows confidence among major tech and automotive companies in the potential of self-driving technology to revolutionize road safety, driving innovation within this domain.

articles.title: Spanish ‘soonicorn’ Multiverse Computing releases free compressed AI model
articles.description: Spanish startup Multiverse Computing has released a new version of its HyperNova 60B model on Hugging Face that, it says, bests Mistral's model.
articles.summary: Spanish startup Multiverse Computing has launched an advanced AI language model called HyperNova 60B on Hugging Face that surpasses Mistral'in capabilities.
points: Multiverse Computing released the free version of its latest compressed Large Language Model (LLM), HyperNova, which they claim outperforms other models like Microsoft’s Bing Codex and Google’s PaLM-2 in terms of quality per token.

The company prides itself on making AI more accessible to developers by offering free versions that are 10% less powerful than the paid version but do not limit usage for businesses or organizations, unlike some other providers' policies.
Multiverse Computing has plans to release three additional model sizes in phases and is committed to expanding accessibility without compromising on technical performance.
articles.insight: The HyperNova AI from Multiverse Computing demonstrates how startups can compete with tech giants by creating high-quality, accessible models that challenge established norms within the IT industry regarding pricing and user limitations for advanced tools.

articles.title: Apple rolls out age-verification tools worldwide to comply with growing web of child safety laws
articles.description: Apple complies with new age-assurance laws in the U.S. and abroad, including those that block users from downloading apps aimed at adults.
articles.summary: Apple has started implementing worldwide tools to verify ages online as compliance with increasing child protection regulations.
points: Global age-verification system deployment by Apple
Compliance enhancin the user's trust in app stores safety measures
Impact on businesses needing parental consent before downloading apps
articles.insight: This demonstrates an industry shift towards prioritizing child and online safety, which could influence future regulations and other companies to adopt similar practices.

articles.title: Uber engineers built an AI version of their boss
articles.description: Uber CEO Dara Khosrowshahi said the company’s employees have gone all in on AI, going so far as to build a chatbot of him that they use to practice their pitches.
articles.summary: Uber CEO Dara Khosrowshahi and his employees have embraced AI technology by creating an artificial intelligence version of him called 'DaraBot.' This bot is used within the company for practicing pitches, demonstrating a commitment to incorporating AI into Uber'de culture.
points: Uber CEO Dara Khosrowshahi and his team built an AI chatbot version of him named 'DaraBot.'
'DaraBot' is used within the company for practicing pitches, illustrating Uber employees' deep involvement with artificial intelligence.
Uber has taken significant steps in integrating technology into its corporate culture by embracing AI.
articles.insight: This innovative approach could set a precedent within the IT/technology industry for using personalized, conversational AI to enhance internal communication and training processes. It may also indicate that Uber is committed to staying at the forefront of technological advancements.

articles.title: Stripe is reportedly eyeing deal to buy some or all of PayPal
articles.description: Stripe might be looking to buy PayPal, or parts of it, per early reports.
articles.summary: Early speculations suggest Stripe is considering a purchase of either some or all of PayPal' end-to end payment platform.
points: Stripe may buy parts of PayPal to extend its services beyond e-commerce and into physical stores with terminals
The deal could potentially include acquiring the checkout technology that powers Square, which is backed by Stripe but has not yet completed such a transaction.
Such an acquisition would be significant as it may change how online payments are processed globally.
articles.insight: If confirmed, this potential deal could reshape the global payment processing landscape and intensify competition among major players in digital transactions.

articles.title: Former L3Harris Trenchant boss jailed for selling hacking tools to Russian broker
articles.description: Peter Williams, the former head of U.S. hacking tools maker L3Harris Trenchant, was sentenced to seven years in prison for stealing and selling his former company’s hacking and surveillance tools to a Russian firm.
articles.summary: Peter Williams, the ex-leader of L3Harris Trenchant, received a seven-year prison sentence for selling stolen hacking technologies to Russia.
points: Former head of U.S. hacker tools firm sentenced in Japan
Russian broker reportedly bought the surveillance equipment from Williams
His actions led to significant fines and imprisonment
articles.insight: This case underlines serious ethical issues within the cybersecurity industry, where stolen tools can end up empowering potential adversaries.
